config module¶

Desc.: Configuration settings within the application object Purpose: app.config.from_object(‘config’) Author: Joel Tannas Date: MAR 03, 2017

class config.BaseConfig[source]¶

Bases: object

Base configuration for the application. It is meant as a ‘baseline’ set of configuration setting that is then extended via more specific configuration

APP_NAME = 'NOA'¶
CSRF_ENABLED = True¶
CSRF_SESSION_KEY = 'ChangeMe'¶
DATABASE_CONNECT_OPTIONS = {}¶
DEBUG = True¶
RECAPTCHA_PRIVATE_KEY = 'ChangeMe'¶
RECAPTCHA_PUBLIC_KEY = 'ChangeMe'¶
RECAPTCHA_USE_SSL = True¶
SECRET_KEY = 'ChangeMe'¶
SESSION_FILE_DIR = '/tmp'¶
SESSION_PERMANENT = False¶
SESSION_TYPE = 'filesystem'¶
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI = 'sqlite:////home/ubuntu/workspace/NOA/app.db'¶
SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS = False¶
THREADS_PER_PAGE = 2¶
gettempdir()¶

Accessor for tempfile.tempdir.
